fields.text: Thank you for calling BuildZoom in San Francisco, your free resource for finding trusted contractors.
To inquire about hiring a contractor for your project, press [INDEX].
If you’re an experienced contractor and want to join BuildZoom, press [INDEX].
To speak with a live advisor about selecting the right contractor, press [INDEX].
For assistance with an existing project quote, press [INDEX].
Please hold and we will connect you with a project specialist shortly.
One moment please while we retrieve your quote details.
To learn how to partner with BuildZoom as a contractor, press [INDEX].
For help with your contractor account or profile, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our contractor onboarding team.
Connecting you to contractor support. Please hold.
